EmailTemplate.subject: TJX’s Customers Have Spoken. It May Be Time for Self-Service.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your mission is to provide great value to your shoppers; NCR’s is too. The retail landscape is changing rapidly, and your shoppers want choice in how they check out. Over 60% of shoppers admit they’re put off by long checkout lines. What if we told you that we could enable you at TJX to deliver a smooth checkout experience for your shoppers that will cut down on queues while maintaining your business goals and key revenue streams? We know you provide high quality items, so why not continue to deliver this through the entire shopping experience—from browsing to checkout?
